abstract: Growing number of men in the party or club circuit are wearing women's high-heeled shoes out, but are otherwise dressed in men's clothing.
snippet: Men in the party or club circuit might wear women’s high heels, though be otherwise dressed in men’s clothing.
lead_paragraph: Men in the party or club circuit might wear women’s high heels, though be otherwise dressed in men’s clothing.

headline.main: A Tall Tale, but True: Men in Heels
headline.print_headline: A Tall Tale, But True: Men in Heels
headline.seo: Some Men Are Dressed to the Nines, the Height of Their Pumps
